BobaPlaces.PlaceDescription: Established in 2016. Located inside Pho VA at Eden Center, we serve bubble tea, flavored tea, coffee, smoothies, and more. With the world's best teas and today's most electric beats, we're Falls Church's trendiest place to go for a refreshing drink.

Established in 1992, Sharetea started off business with to-go black tea and pearl milk tea drinks in Taipei, Taiwan. Since then Sharetea has opened many branches and franchises in 16 countries such as United States, Canada, Southeast Asia, Australia, Dubai and over 300 stores.
Moge Tee shops offering a variety of hot and cold teas, including bubble tea, cheese tea and fruit tea, desserts and related items.
PGEM TEA is a renovated milk bubble tea shop. We serve milk tea with toppings of your choices, coffee, and smoothies. We also serve various Asian meals or snacks to satisfy your stomach.

Founded in Queens, NY on April 30, 2010, we’re America’s largest bubble tea brand with over 250+ locations across the U.S. As one of the OGs of bubble tea, we maintain uncompromisingly high standards. Let’s be real.

Founded in 2006 in Kaohsiung, Taiwan. Gong Cha today is one of the most recognized bubble tea brands around the world. Known for quality tea and service, Gong Cha has withheld its reputation against many existing competitors.
